page.title: 13The Youth Centre Barton
page.content: The Youth Centre attached to the John Taylor High School has a full-time Youth Tutor,and trained part-time leaders and instructors.The centre runs a Junior and a Senior Youth Club. The junior club is for 10-13 year olds and meets on Wednesday evenings from 6.15 to 7.45 p.m. and activities organised for members include indoor games,five-a -side football,cookery,art and craft etc.Ice skating trips and discos are organised occasionally. The Senior club is for 13-21 year olds, which meets four or five times a week and organises a wide range of social and sporting activities.There are activity weekends such as camps, canoeing,climbing,ice-skating and pony trekking.The centre is open on two afternoons a week for young people who are unemployed.Practice is provided in life and social skills.
